name: Lunch Rush! (egoftcp)
description:
Updated version of LunchRush! playable from either the browser or locally on the desktop by downloading the source code .zip folder.

Be the first to get to the lunchroom--no matter what! Battle your friends for the right to be King of the Cafeteria.

2-player local play only. Current version has been adapted for use with the keyboard. The original version, designed to work with Xbox 360 controllers, can be found here: https://egoftcp.itch.io/lunch-rush

Keyboard Controls:

Start/Pause - ] key

Y Button: Y key

P1 Controls:

Movement - Left and Right arrow keys

Jump/A Button - Up arrow key

Kick/X Button - ; key

Back/B Button - O key

P2 Controls:

Movement - A and D keys

Jump/A Button - W key

Kick/X Button - Spacebar

Back/B Button - C key

Made by team Whiskey Eggnog:

* Eric Gonzalez

* Austin Henry

* William Bracho Blok

* Austin Ruff
